EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 3 - Zero Emission
EmailTemplate.subject: Break the link between rising traffic and energy
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Zero-carbon vision is a business opportunity Target zero emissions? Here’s why As your radio network handles more traffic, its energy costs will rise.
No, it doesn’t have to be this way.
There are many innovations you can deploy to deliver more mobile broadband while reducing your network’s energy use. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
